item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: wpkoi
item.content:encoded:
Our services

Egestas congue quisque egestas diam in arcu. Consectetur purus ut faucibus.

Click here

About wpkoi themes

Different Layouts

You can choose from different body, header, footer and blog styles with WPKoi theme.

Plugin Compatible

WPKoi themes are compatible with Elementor page builder and WooCommerce webshop plugins!

GPL License

The theme and the plugin is under GPL license so You can use them on as many sites as You want!

Premium Features

Unlimited Colors

You can customize almost all of the colors in the customizer. Header, footer, content, sidebars, font colors etc.

More Layouts

However the free theme has a lot of layout feature but the premium version has much more!

Hooks

You can add custom HTML, JS or PHP code to wp_2_head, wp_2_footer or to oder parts of the theme.

Customizable Fonts

Customize the typography with Premium version. You can select from Google Fonts and add the paramaters.

Page Header

Add images or video to the header of the pages and blog loops with this theme! You can also add texts on it.

Much More...

If You need a fully customizable stable and fast theme with clean design WPKoi themes are for You!

item.title: Image Post
item.dc:creator: wpkoi
item.content:encoded:
Post Formats is a theme feature introduced with Version 3.1. A Post Format is a piece of meta information that can be used by a theme to customize its presentation of a post. The Post Formats feature provides a standardized list of formats that are available to all themes that support the feature. Themes are not required to support every format on the list. New formats cannot be introduced by themes or even plugins. The standardization of this list provides both compatibility between numerous themes and an avenue for external blogging tools to access this feature in a consistent fashion.
  • aside - Typically styled without a title. Similar to a Facebook note update.
  • link - A link to another site. Themes may wish to use the first <a href=ââ> tag in the post content as the external link for that post. An alternative approach could be if the post consists only of a URL, then that will be the URL and the title (post_title) will be the name attached to the anchor for it.
  • image - A single image. The first <img /> tag in the post could be considered the image. Alternatively, if the post consists only of a URL, that will be the image URL and the title of the post (post_title) will be the title attribute for the image.
  • quote - A quotation. Probably will contain a blockquote holding the quote content. Alternatively, the quote may be just the content, with the source/author being the title.
  • status - A short status update, similar to a Twitter status update.

Filterable Gallery Element

WPKoi Filterable Gallery is an Elementor page builder element included in the premium version of the WPKoi theme. You can display Your images with filters and link in different styles. All colors and contents are customizable in a user friendly way.

  • Filter 2

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: wpkoi
item.content:encoded:
Our services

Egestas congue quisque egestas diam in arcu. Consectetur purus ut faucibus.

Click here

About wpkoi themes

Different Layouts

You can choose from different body, header, footer and blog styles with WPKoi theme.

Plugin Compatible

WPKoi themes are compatible with Elementor page builder and WooCommerce webshop plugins!

GPL License

The theme and the plugin is under GPL license so You can use them on as many sites as You want!

Premium Features

Unlimited Colors

You can customize almost all of the colors in the customizer. Header, footer, content, sidebars, font colors etc.

More Layouts

However the free theme has a lot of layout feature but the premium version has much more!

Hooks

You can add custom HTML, JS or PHP code to wp_2_head, wp_2_footer or to oder parts of the theme.

Customizable Fonts

Customize the typography with Premium version. You can select from Google Fonts and add the paramaters.

Page Header

Add images or video to the header of the pages and blog loops with this theme! You can also add texts on it.

Much More...

If You need a fully customizable stable and fast theme with clean design WPKoi themes are for You!

Client carousel for Demo

WPKoi premium versions have some extra Elementor page builder elements above the defaults. See the examples below!

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: wpkoi
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

item.title: Aside Post
item.dc:creator: wpkoi
item.content:encoded: Do You love WordPress? You've found Your place! WPKoi themes are for WordPress lovers under GPL license. You can find theme demos at wpkoi.com. The demos use Elementor, WooCommerce and Contact Form 7 plugins. The premium demo uses the premium plugin also. WPKoi themes have an easy to use admin with a lot of customizer functions, so You can build Your dream without coding knowledge. The themes are responsive so looks good on almost every devices. The themes are multipurpose so You can use it for represent Your business, show Your portfolio, start a blog, start a webshop and sell Your products etc. You can setup multiple header styles, navigation styles and layouts. Build You site with a WPKoi theme and share it with the world!
